product_name: Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Pint Cup - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: Get rid of the plastic and pick up a Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Pint cup. Cup is made of tough 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that is BPA free and dishwasher safe; steel won't retain or impart flavors. Rugged stainless steel won't break like glass. Cups are stackable and easily transportable. Laser-etched Klean Kanteen logo won't wear off. Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Pint cup is dishwasher safe.
short_description: Get rid of the plastic and pick up a Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Pint cup.
